TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimeSpanValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确保对象满足特定的条件。 The class is used to ensure that a object meets specific criteria. 具有两个参数的 构造函数可确保同时遵循最小值和最大值。The constructor with two parameters ensures that both a minimum and a maximum value are adhered to. 带有三个参数的构造函数同时检查最小值和最大值, 以及验证范围是否为排他。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 具有四个参数的构造函数检查前面的三个参数, 并检查该值是否与特定的秒数相等。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific number of seconds. 方法确定所验证的对象类型是否与预期的类型匹配。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 要验证的对象作为方法的参数进行传递。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定参数后, 要验证的对象必须等于此值才能通过验证。 `resolutionInSeconds`When the `resolutionInSeconds` parameter is specified, the object being validated must be equal to this value in order to pass validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含验证对象所需的规则。The object contains the rules necessary to validate a object. 创建类的实例时, 将建立规则。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要验证的对象作为方法的参数传递。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
